Cytochrome P 450 enzymes

Cytochrome P 450 enzymes . Large group of enzymes involved in hepatic metabolism (Phase 1: oxidation, hydroxylation) of many drugs (warfarin, benzodiazepines , xxx). Volatile agents are metabolised by the subtype 2e1.

INHIBITORS

Omeprazole

D

E

V

I

C

E

S

INDUCERS

Phenytoin

Carbamazepine

Barbiturates
